Title: Relates to establishing the abortion access fund and allowing taxpayers to make gifts to the fund
Summary: Establishes the abortion access fund and allows for individuals to designate a gift to the fund on their personal income tax returns.
LawCode: Add ยง630-g, Tax L; add ยง99-hh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to allowing taxpayers to make a gift to the abortion access fund on their personal income tax returns
